network.software
Class HTTPServer

java.lang.Object
  network.AbstractProcess
      network.software.HTTPServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Process
public class HTTPServer
extends AbstractProcess

A process implementing a simple HTTP server. The HTTP here is that defined by the HTTP class.

Author:
Luke Maurer

          API for dynamic handling of HTTP requests.

Constructor Detail

HTTPServer

public HTTPServer()
Method Detail

addFile

public void addFile(String location,
                    String content)
Add content to the server. Subsequent requests for the given location will return the given content.

Parameters:
location - The location at which to add the content.
content - The content to add.

addRedirect

public void addRedirect(String location,
                        String targetUrl)
Add a redirect to the server. Subsequent requests for the given location will return a redirect to the given URL.

Parameters:
location - The location at which to add the redirect.
targetUrl - The URL to redirect to.

addHandler

public void addHandler(String location,
                       HTTPServer.Handler handler)
Install a request handler to serve requests dynamically.

Parameters:
location - The location at which to install the handler.
handler - The handler to install.
